verbs.description: [V: imperiled] portland psychiatric er receives state ok unity center for behavioral health was on track to lose federal funding after state health investigators found that the facility routinely allowed patients to hurt themselves physically and sexually assault each other and escape nurses and staff gave patients the wrong medications in the wrong amounts according to state documents oregon health authority centers of medicare assault unity medicare medicaid portland unity center for behavioral health
